segments.text: Hi , I'm here to look at the one-bedroom apartment you have for rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( They walk over to the apartment . ) As you can see , it's large and completely furnished .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What bills are included in the rent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to pay the electricity bill yourself , but water is paid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I guess for $ 400 a month I shouldn't expect an all bills paid apartment .
segments.speaker: S2
